roleset.name: diminish loudness (of a sound), diminish loudness

example.name: passive with instrument
example.text: No one speaks, and the snaking of the ropes seems to make as much sound as [the bells themselves]-1, *trace*-1 muffled *trace*-1 by the ceiling.

example.name: agentive
example.text: John muffled his laughter at Mary's slipping on the ice.
example.arg: his laughter at Mary's slipping on the ice.

example.name: arg 1
example.text: No bleeding, some muffling of sound

roleset.note: MUFFLE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'muffle' based on sentences in wsj. VN class subjugate-42.3. (from muffle.01-v)
MUFFLING-N NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to muffle.01. Muffle.01 is a memebr of VN class subjugate-42.3. Framed by Katie. (from muffling.01-n)
MUFFLED-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from muffled.01-j)
